title: PSA 2 T206 Putman Louisville for sale

posts.post_title: PSA 2 T206 Putman Louisville for sale
posts.post_content:
Hello, I have a T206 PSA 2 Puttman Louisville card for sale.  I am not looking to get a whole lot of money out of it.  If anyone is interested just send a offer to my email at [url]wacturner@hotmail.com[/url]  I am only able to accept check and money orders right now.  Thanks

Tony
